channel.title: from avi import musings
channel.description: Recent content on from avi import musings

item.description: Hosting Hugo Site on GitHub Pages I am hosting my Hugo generate static site on GitHub Pages. My setup is as follows: My site repo is on GitHub Locally i have clone on my mac. As per the instructions here, I embed my avilior.github.io site as the public folder where hugo generates the site. I have a deploy.sh script that I use to deploy the site. Site Generator Choice

item.title: In the Beginning
item.description: Beresheet - In the Beginning - בְּרֵאשִׁית As the Book of Genesis starts so I start my Blog. The intent behind the title is non-pretentious, but rather a hommage to my people and to Israel’s ill-fated Lunar Lander Beresheet. Although, if the blog emits more than a few entries, for me it will be a feat of Biblical proportions. The main purpose is to capture my thoughts about stuff that matters to me and other musings.
